title: Officially the Offseason: Coaching Carousel, Team Building, and the Draft for Dummies | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Tjarks are joined by The Ringer’s Kevin O’Connor to talk head coaching rumors (0:39) and potential offseason moves for teams around the league (14:13). Then Tjarks goes through his Draft Guide for Dummies (53:33).

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks

Guest: Kevin O’Connor
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
